issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Platform>Utils, in 1.7.0 the base64 decode is "[object TiBlob] => abcdefg, decoded: [object Object]

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS and navigate to Platform>Utils
2) launch test and check results

Result:
[object TiBlob] => abcdefg, decoded: [object Object]

Expected result:
base64 decode abcdefg => abcdefg, decoded abcdefg

Notes:
Does not occur on 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink Utils test decode issue
fields.environment: iPhone4 Verizon (4.2.6), Titanium SDK version:(1.7.0.e6afca8...), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105111905

comments.body: Hat tip to Blain for assisting with this one.
Verified decoding works as expected on Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.6) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r86dae2c9. Closing.
